channel.title: ----Need Help WitH Teleportation Spells! & Combat Xp Rates----
channel.description:
First Question--Ok,I really need help with teleportation spells in the spell book.
What i mean by this is i wanna add a teleportation spell in the spell book that teleports you to *Example* to varrok without using any runes? i know its something about teleport.cfg but its not in the config folder.. :(
If anyone knows the answer..i need the COORDS for the following places/// Fishing Guild(<--optional) , Falador , Varrok , Draynor , & Edgville .
ALSO TELL ME WHERE TO PUT THE COORDS!!
Thanks!
Second Question--Hey,everyone.
I need help with combat xp rates.By this i mean..Once i attack a monster my str lvl or whatever i use goes to like 50.and if my xp rate is *Example* " Your Current Xp is 2000. You will Level at "2100" I want to change that "2100" to like 5000..so it just keeps raising x2 or what so ever everytime i gain a level.
--What I want is..Whenever i attack an npc/monster i dont want my str lvl or whatever i use, to level to 50 or 30 in seconds..
Thankss.

item.title: ----Need Help WitH Teleportation Spells! & Combat Xp Rates----
item.dc:creator: @Kartex Kartex
item.description:
@Kartex wrote:

Were is teleport.cfg …? its not in the config folder… :eek:

B2300 T4nk:

Its teleport.cfg and find the coords for the spots you want.

Read full topic
